description.value:
You can hear the thrum of magic as if it were a swirling note, a shifting melody, a harmonic chord, or a percussive beat, pulsing in tune with your heart. You can detect the presence of magic as though you were always using a 1st-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Detect Magic] spell. This detects magic within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30].

At 13th level, the rank of detect magic increases to 3rd. At 17th level, the rank of detect magic increases to 4th.

value.value: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
